Campaigns

Name Clicks Date

Agencies

{exp:query sql="select title,agency,site,count(*) as ct,field_id_148 as first_name,field_id_149 as last_name,field_id_151 as city,field_id_152 as state from expemail_redirects r join exp_weblog_titles t on r.agency = t.url_title join exp_weblog_data d on d.entry_id = t.entry_id group by agency order by ct desc limit 10"} {/exp:query}

{count} {title} {ct} {first_name} {last_name} {city}, {state}
